LanguageData.TropicalRainforest.label: rừng mưa nhiệt đới
LanguageData.TropicalRainforest.description: A thick, moist jungle. Despite its visual beauty, this is a very dangerous biome. Choking overgrowth, aggressive animals, and constant disease are why some explorers call this the "green hell".
LanguageData.TropicalSwamp.label: đầm lầy nhiệt đới
LanguageData.TropicalSwamp.description: A thick jungle with lots of marsh and mud. Difficult movement, little space to build heavy structures, aggresive animals, and constant diseases make living here a nightmare.
